name: Balgownie Estate Vineyard Resort & Spa

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a fantastic evening at the Balgownie Vineyard Retreat. We booked into the Executive One Bedroom apartment which had a balcony and a spa in the bathroom which had a beautiful view of the valley. The room was large, light and well furnished. Better than the hyatt in canberra that we had stayed the night before!
reviews.title: Fantastic Place

likes.liked: — The spa that overlooked the vineyard

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Prior to dinner we enjoyed a bottle of the sparkling wine in our suite with some of the nicest spring rolls we have ever tasted. We chose this hotel as it had a restaurant and we weren't disappointed by the food. We choose to pair the wines with the dish so that we could make the most of what the winery had to offer. The only slight hiccup was the lack of cheese on the menu they only had 2 of the cheeses avaliable as it had been a very busy weekend.
reviews.title: A relaxing stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We would have loved to try out the spa and the sporting facilities but time was short. I am sure we will return and I have no problems in reccomending this place to anyone.
reviews.title: Great Views, Lovely Rooms, Big Resort

reviews.text: In the heart of the Yarra Valley vineyard region the external appearance of Balgownie can be compared to a University campus but don't let that put you off as it's what's on the inside that counts.
reviews.title: Had a great time at Balgownie

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We received a warm welcome at reception and our room was large, well equipped and clean. The bathroom was particularly worthy of note as whilst it lacked a bathtub this was compensated for by an enormous, and powerful, shower.
reviews.title: Great Resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed at Balgownie Estate at the start of the year and until now hadn't had a chance to write a proper review.
reviews.title: Huge rooms - magnificent views!
Good value for money
reviews.text: Let me start by saying that the views from the rooms are amazing - couldn't ask for better views over the Yarra Valley famous vineyards and beautiful surrounds.

I booked a one night stay here a few weeks ago, as a treat for myself and my Brother and his Wife. I decided to go for the room, dinner bed and breakfast package. When I made the booking, the staff on the phone were friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Expensive Disappointment

likes.disliked: — Poor staff attitude and dreadfull food

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived here yesterday and checked in around lunchtime, again, the staff were very welcoming and pleasant.
reviews.title: Extremelly disappointing

reviews.text: Our rooms were upstairs balcony spa suites, with separate bedrooms, living areas, kitchenettes and a big spa bath in each room. Very clean and new was the initial impression. The rooms were very well equipped.
reviews.title: Great rooms, awful staff and restaurant

reviews.text: I was surprised however to see that they were charging even for the bottled water, as well as for the numerous bottles of wine that had been left in the room.
reviews.title: Loved Balgownie

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stepped out onto the balcony to find in need of a good clean, there were spiders' webs everywhere, and there was a layer of dust on the furniture and surfaces. There was bird guano on the balcony railing, which spoilt the overall impression of the place.
reviews.title: A relaxing time in the Yarra Valley

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in early 2007 and had a less than good experience with some overseas visitors. We returned in JAN 2008 (no visitors in tow this time) for an overnight stay and found things greatly improved...
reviews.title: Greatly Improved - Good Stay...

likes.liked: — Smart, Clean, functional and great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast in particular was a huge improvement.
reviews.title: A couples paradise!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Would recommend as smart accommodation centrally located in the Yarra Valley - with nice pool/gym etc. The restaurant is well regarded although we did not partake of dinner this time around.
reviews.title: If you want to eat make sure you book the Restaurant!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Congratulations to the management team on how things are now!
reviews.title: Loved the resort!

reviews.text: I booked a weekend away for my 3 year anniversary. I was attracted to Balgownie as my partner and i love wines and vineyards.
reviews.title: Excellent Stay

aka: Balgownie Estate Vineyard Hotel Yarra Glen
description: Balgownie Estate Vineyard Resort & Spa is ideally located in the heart of the Yarra Valley less than 1hr from Melbourne CBD & Airport. Boasting contemporary first class spa suite accommodation with spectacular views across the valley, Rae’s Restaurant, Cellar Door with complimentary wine tasting 7 days, Health Club, Natskin Spa Retreat, modern conferencing and leisure facilities plus more! Whenever you visit, you are guaranteed a memorable stay in the heart of Victorian wine country.
